hello: Hello, where would you like to go?
ask_name: OK, can I have your name, please?
ride_ask_destination: Alright, where do you want to go?
ride_ask_departure: Sure, and where are you departing from?
ride_ask_confirm_booking: OK, picking up from {departure_location:s} and going to {arrival_location:s}, can I book this ride for you?
ride_bye: Thank you and enjoy your ride!
ride_confirm_booking: Right, your {service_provider:s} ride is all booked for you now!
ride_provide_driver_details: OK, your {service_provider:s} driver {driver_name:s} will arrive in approximately {minutes_till_pickup:d} minutes in a {car_model:s} with license plate {license_plate:s}. Your booking id is {booking_id:d} and your ride will cost {price:d} EUR.
